thread.title: Great experience. Friendly staff. Clean room. Restful night
thread.title_full: Great experience. Friendly staff. Clean room. Restful night - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kyle m
title: Great experience. Friendly staff. Clean room. Restful night
text: I had a great experience staying at the Hilton in Times Square. When you're checking in, ask for Kenny. He is a friendly, helpful and he got me a room with a tremendous view of Midtown Manhattan. Well done, Hilton (and Kenny!) I'd definitely stay here again.
